questions.question: To inspect a feature cache in Visual Preview, click the:
Partial runs can help speed up the authoring of workspaces by:
options: Allowing you to only run part of your workspace.
Allowing you to update a single cache.
Allowing you to quickly inspect data you just added to the canvas.
Allowing you to create a cache of web, database, or compressed data.

questions.question: You just made a change to a transformer in the middle of your workspace and want to rewrite the output data to reflect the change. Which partial run button would you use after clicking on the transformer where you made changes?
